data.text: @turtle_savant Hi Ak, you may do so during your layover. Do note that each passenger must hold a valid passport (and visa(s), if required) to be allowed entry into each destination on the flight itinerary. For more information, you may wish to visit https://t.co/cs5KdNVg3X. Thank you.
